    • 构造器详细资料

      • AnimalManure

        public AnimalManure(java.lang.String appearance,
                    int x,
                    int y)
        Constructs a new feces at the specified cursor location (x, y).
        参数:
        x - the x co-ordinate of the food's cursor location.
        y - the y co-ordinate of the food's cursor location.

    • 方法详细资料

      • draw

        public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
        Draws this farm pen item.
        参数:
        g - the graphics context in which to draw this item.
